name: HNC 3D level editing - survival level (title WIP)
name_original: HNC 3D level editing - survival level (title WIP)
description:
You wake up on an island at the entrance of the forest, so you try to survive by making a house, farm, and eta. When you go exploring there will be a forest, mountains, and deserts. You find a cave that you can go and explore. You find an underground lab in the caves, so you explore and find out what happed to the lab.

This game is made for the HNC 3D Level Editing class and it is in the prototype stage and I will try to keep working on it.
